import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AllBlogs=()=>{const[blogs,setBlogs]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBlogs=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/blog/allBlogs");const data=await response.json();setBlogs(data.blogs||[]);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching blogs:",error);}};fetchBlogs();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"allblogs-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"All Blogs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-list",children:blogs.map(blog=>{var _blog$author;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[blog.content.split(" ").slice(0,20).join(" "),"..."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/blog/".concat(blog._id),className:"read-more-button",children:"Read More"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"blog-author",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Author:"})," ",((_blog$author=blog.author)===null||_blog$author===void 0?void 0:_blog$author.Name)||"Unknown"]})]},blog._id);})})]});};export default AllBlogs;
